channel.title: What do I put in?
channel.description:
Hey, what do I put in Compile and Run? I have tried the ones in the Starting a private server tut but I get this error: client.java:10656: non-static method killServer() cannot be referenced from a st atic context server.killServer(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .
Please help in this problem :D

item.title: What do I put in?
item.dc:creator: @purelion6679 purelion6679
item.description:
@purelion6679 wrote:

im a lazy bastard and i still use two different files for this, one to compile and one to run the server.
my compiler code looks like this:
[scar]@echo off
title YOURSCAPE Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause[/scar]

and my runserver.bat file looks like this:
[scar]@echo off
title YOURSCAPEHERE Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/scar]

quick explanation: the compiler opens up the javac component inside the java directory. make sure the path is correct for YOUR version of java or youll get that annoying but easy to fix “javac is not recognized…” bullcrap. The second one works the same, it calls a file inside of the development kit to actually handle the process of running the server. easy stuff, hope it helped.

Read full topic

item.title: What do I put in?
item.dc:creator: @Madman00901 Madman00901
item.description:
@Madman00901 wrote:

Hey, what do I put in Compile and Run? I have tried the ones in the Starting a private server tut but I get this error:
client.java:10656: non-static method killServer() cannot be referenced from a st
atic context
server.killServer();
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Press any key to continue . . .

Please help in this problem
